ROOT.GetPrivRealBitUserList: " <<<@progID='%s'>>> <<<@bitValue=%d>>> select distinct A.userNum, userID, userName, B.userCompany, userDuty, userDept, userOffice, userOfficeTel, userFax, userAddr, userPostCode, userURL, userMobile, userMobileBak, userNickname, userEMail, userEMailBak, userBirthday, usersex, userRemark from dbUserGroupRela join v_NormalUser A on dbUserGroupRela.userNum = A.userNum left join dbUserDetail B on A.usernum = B.usernum join dbGroup C on dbUserGroupRela.groupID = C.groupID join tbProgram D on C.programNum = D.programNum join ( select R.usernum from /*get the user list which has privilege*/ ( select distinct usernum, 1 privValue from tbUserRoleGroup UR join tbprivgroupbit RB on UR.privgroupid = RB.privgroupid where RB.bitValue = @bitValue union select usernum, privValue from tbUserBit where bitValue = @bitValue and privValue = 1 ) R left join ( select usernum, privValue from tbUserBit where bitValue = @bitValue and privValue = 0 ) UnsetB on R.usernum = UnsetB.usernum where UnsetB.privValue is null ) ConditionUser on A.userNum = ConditionUser.userNum where (@progID = 'AllProg' or D.programID = @progID) order by A.userId "
